bike.description: Specialized FACT 10r carbon, FACT IS construction, uniquely shaped, tapered 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" head tube, compact race design w/ Zertz inserts, internal cable routing, OSBB

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon, full monocoque, Zertz inserts
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings, w/ 8mm carbon cone spacer and 20mm of carbon spacers
New Specialized ProSet 7075, cone head bolt and plastic clip, 12-degree, 4-degree shim, 31.8mm
Specialized Roubaix Gel wrap w/ neoprene pads
Shimano Dura-Ace STI, Flight Deck compatible, 10-speed
Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
Specialized Turbo Pro w/ BlackBelt, 127 TPI, aramid bead, 700x25c
Specialized Turbo Pro w/ BlackBelt, 127 TPI, aramid bead, 700x25c
Body Geometry Toupé Plus Expert, hollow ti rails
Specialized Pro, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert
Carbon chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
